EmailTemplate.description: Secure Agent status generated notification from Informatica Cloud Integrations Unmanaged Package
EmailTemplate.name: Integration: Secure Agent
EmailTemplate.subject: The Informatica Cloud Secure Agent is down
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello, The Informatica Cloud Secure Agent for {!Organization.Name} is down. The Secure Agent is used by Informatica Cloud to transmit core extract files into nCino. If the Agent remains offline, then today's batch integration will not run. Please reach out to your IT department to have the Informatica Cloud Secure Agent restarted as soon as possible. Thank you, nCino Data Services
